EmailTemplate.name: Custom Benefit Plan is Pending DMHC Approval
EmailTemplate.subject: Custom Benefit Plan is Pending DMHC Approval - Employer Name: {!Custom_Benefit_Plan__c.Plan_Related_to_Account__c}/DBA: {!Custom_Benefit_Plan__c.DBA__c} Employer Type: {!Custom_Benefit_Plan__c.Employer_Type__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
The Custom Plan Request {!Custom_Benefit_Plan__c.Name} for Employer Name: {!Custom_Benefit_Plan__c.Plan_Related_to_Account__c}/DBA: {!Custom_Benefit_Plan__c.DBA__c}, Employer Type: {!Custom_Benefit_Plan__c.Employer_Type__c} is pending approval by the DMHC as filed.
Please reach out to BPA for information regarding possible plan modifications.
Thank you.
